title: Did Cops Thrash A Youth For Riding Without Helmet? No, It’s False
subtitle: Police Thrash Youth Viral Video Fact Check: A video is being massively shared on Facebook which shows a cop thrashing a man. The accompanying text with the video claims that the man was beaten up because he was not wearing a helmet while riding.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Ever since the New Motor Vehicles Act has been implemented, there has been a flurry of videos which show the public and police quarreling over hefty challans. While many videos are real, quite a lot of old and unrelated videos are being passed off with false claims.

Now, a video is being massively shared on Facebook which shows a cop thrashing a man. The accompanying text with the video claims that the man was beaten up because he was not wearing a helmet while riding.

“अगर आपने हेलमेट नहीं लगाया तो इन पुलिस वालों को मारने का अधिकार किसने दिया | (Who gave these policemen the right to thrash this man?)
